EmailTemplate.name: End date exceeded
EmailTemplate.subject: Thesis Submission update - {!Contact.Name} {!Contact.Person_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.First_Name__c},
Congratulations on the successful online submission of your thesis.
We regret to inform that we can not approve your online submission at present, as your candidature has ended.
As your candidature ended on (original candidature end date) you must complete the Thesis Submission Extension before we are able to finalise your submission and dispatch the thesis to your examiners.
To action this, please complete a online Thesis Submission Extension to extend your candidature as soon as possible. To expedite your thesis submission, you should complete the form with the following:
Mandatory fields such as; 'Reason', 'Progress to Date' and 'remaining work' with the following suggested text: 'I have started my online submission and require an extension to my candidature to facilitate examination of my thesis' Extension Length: apply for an adequate extension period. Eg: from the time your candidate ended to now.
Once the extension is processed by the MGE Candidature Operations team; we will initiate the thesis examination.
We would like to take this opportunity to congratulate you again on your achievements.
Kind Regards,
{!User.FirstName}
Graduate Research Examinations Team | Graduate Research Services
_______________________
